content: simple ribbed pattern yarn one 200g cake of donegal tweed gradient cast on 21 stitches with a us 10 75 needle row 1 *knit 2 stitches purl 1 stitch repeat from * to end of row repeat row 1 until you have 28 of yarn remaining bind off in pattern never miss a stitch follow us on social media @makersmercantile /makersmercantile
